exm.mng: Pei county in Xuzhou 徐州[Xu2 zhou1], Jiangsu
homeless and miserable (idiom); to wander about in a desperate plight, to drift
copious, plentiful (of water), surging (of waves), refers to home village of first Han emperor 漢高祖|汉高祖[Han4 Gao1 zu3], fig. majestic

lit. Xiangzhuang performs the sword dance, but his mind is set on Liu Bang 劉邦|刘邦 (idiom); refers to 206 BC plot to murder Liu Bang 劉邦|刘邦, Duke of Pei 沛公 and future Han emperor, during a sword dance at Feast at Hongmen 鴻門宴|鸿门宴[Hóng mén Yàn], an elaborate deception to hide malicious intent
exm.pyn: Xiàng Zhuāng wǔ jiàn , yì zài Pèi Gōng

exm.mng: destitute and homeless (idiom); displaced and without means

lit. Xiangzhuang performs the sword dance, but his mind is set on Liu Bang 劉邦|刘邦 (idiom); refers to 206 BC plot to murder Liu Bang 劉邦|刘邦, Duke of Pei 沛公 and future Han emperor, during a sword dance at Feast at Hongmen 鴻門宴|鸿门宴[Hóng mén Yàn], an elaborate deception to hide malicious intent
exm.pyn: Xiàng Zhuāng wǔ jiàn , zhì zài Pèi Gōng
